citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on
04-JUN-19.
Arrived at facility and made contact with an adult on premise. No adult with knowledge of the regulated activity was
available to facilitate the inspection. Discussed the requirement for a responsible adult to be made available during
business hours to accompany APHIS officials on inspection.
